title: bnbstorm
author: bnbstorm
created_time: January 19, 2023, 07:30:46 PMLast edit: February 03, 2024, 07:54:08 PM by bnbstorm
content: Dear SellDefi Users,We regret to inform you that Selldefi Service is closing on 05-02-2024. Despite our efforts, we couldn't garner enough users and profits to sustain the business.Key Information:    Clear Payments: All payments are settled. For inquiries, DM.    Link Deactivation: Product links are disabled.    Data Deletion: User files and information are permanently deleted.We appreciate your support and apologize for any inconvenience.Thank you for being part of SellDefi.Sincerely,Selldefi team(Selldefi was a service to sell digital files for bitcoin anonymously. It was closed after a small run due to lack of users.)

comments.author: bnbstorm
comments.created_time: January 19, 2023, 07:40:37 PMLast edit: February 12, 2023, 01:16:38 AM by bnbstorm
comments.body: Reserved For Announcements and Updates:Features Updates:Total Number of ViewsAdded a new CAPTCHA featureReduced Service fee from 6% to 4%Updated Bitcoin address type from P2PKH to P2WPKHBig Feature Update including accounts, affiliates and stats etcNews:SellDefi ANN post graphics updatedSellDefi Signature Campaign StartedHack Attempt on SellDefiService fee reduction

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: bnbstorm on January 19, 2023, 07:40:37 PMWe are looking for marketing of our service. Signature compaign managers can comment if they are interested. And anyone with any other marketing idea can also discuss.Hello!Welcome to the forum.I would like to offer my service. Please feel free to check my service thread and the current campaigns I am managing. I am positive that you will not be disappointed.Cheers,Edit:I was just checking the website. Nice design but it only allows me to list a file. There must be a page to see all the listing so that others can buy them?

comments.author: bnbstorm
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on January 19, 2023, 07:43:57 PMQuote from: bnbstorm on January 19, 2023, 07:40:37 PMWe are looking for marketing of our service. Signature compaign managers can comment if they are interested. And anyone with any other marketing idea can also discuss.Hello!Welcome to the forum.I would like to offer my service. Please feel free to check my service thread and the current campaigns I am managing. I am positive that you will not be disappointed.Cheers,Edit:I was just checking the website. Nice design but it only allows me to list a file. There must be a page to see all the listing so that others can buy them?Thank you for offering your service. You can dm us so we can discuss it further.We cannot open all products links for keeping anonymity. There is a possibility someone want to sell their products to only limited persons. It is better that sellers upload files and then share link with their wanted audience. If we public all products there will also a possibility to replicate products and offer fake/scam files in lower prices.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: bnbstorm on January 19, 2023, 07:55:37 PMIt is better that sellers upload files and then share link with their wanted audience. Ah! Now it solves the puzzle for me. I will DM you shortly Cheers,

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: bnbstorm on January 19, 2023, 07:55:37 PMWe cannot open all products links for keeping anonymity. There is a possibility someone want to sell their products to only limited persons. It is better that sellers upload files and then share link with their wanted audience. If we public all products there will also a possibility to replicate products and offer fake/scam files in lower prices.I must agree with Royse777. it would be good if you at least make a demo of what it looks like when the offer is set.maybe it's a good signal for promotion, stimulating users to test your platform. This way it seems rather poor and does not inspire confidence. it's just an impression from your website at first glance.and yes, I can recommend Royse777 as a campaign manager, he does his job well.

This way it seems rather poor and does not inspire confidence. it's just an impression from your website at first glance.and yes, I can recommend Royse777 as a campaign manager, he does his job well.Thank you for your interest in our service. You can check product uploaded pages on this demo product link Link RemovedAlso as described earlier it is not good idea to publicly share all uploaded products as they can contain personal data. We will try to find some solution for displaying products in a market way if seller agree to post it publicly. But again it will be a mess to control spam and fake products on market.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on January 19, 2023, 07:43:57 PMQuote from: bnbstorm on January 19, 2023, 07:40:37 PMWe are looking for marketing of our service. Signature compaign managers can comment if they are interested. And anyone with any other marketing idea can also discuss.Hello!Welcome to the forum.I would like to offer my service. Please feel free to check my service thread and the current campaigns I am managing. I am positive that you will not be disappointed.Cheers,Edit:I was just checking the website. Nice design but it only allows me to list a file. There must be a page to see all the listing so that others can buy them?You are right Sir. I checked and noticed same thing too. Participants and potential buyers would find it difficult buying what they have no idea about. If you want it anonymous, there is no issue about that but it would be nice one knows what he or she wants to buy if not seeing it, bit atleast a little description can help a little in having idea what sellers are offering to sale. I also have a look at the site although it is a new on but the IU is not attractive but a kind of dull to say. If I may ask how do you confirm to know that the person downloading the file is the one who paid for it. Do you not think that one can copy a transaction hash and claim they paid for it? How does it work?

comments.author: MinMan
comments.body: Basically what files I may need to buy or sell? Pirated contents? Collectibles?I am just curious to educate myself on what are the scope of a marketplace for files in the world of deep darkweb and high speed internet.

comments.author: bnbstorm

If I may ask how do you confirm to know that the person downloading the file is the one who paid for it. Do you not think that one can copy a transaction hash and claim they paid for it? How does it work?Sellers can add description to their products. There is an option to add description to product. In description they can provide details about what they are selling. We have tried to keep things simple in terms of UI.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: what happens if a seller provide a description and upload a wrong file/damaged or just make a scam? how it can be trusted the contents? did you plan to make escrow on transactions?what if there are virus/trojan/malware added to these files? did you plan to scan contents uploaded?

comments.author: bnbstorm
comments.body: Quote from: MinMan on January 19, 2023, 08:15:50 PMBasically what files I may need to buy or sell? Pirated contents? Collectibles?I am just curious to educate myself on what are the scope of a marketplace for files in the world of deep darkweb and high speed internet.You can sell any type of projects. Like if you have made a website or made a new software you can sell its source code. You can sell your new music. You can sell your digital art. Video editors can sell their edited videos to clients. If a file content is unique and you only want to sell it to limited people then there is an option to set sell limit. You can sell a file for like 1 time or as many times as you want. It is like a digital store. You don't have to worry about payment and product delivery. Users can ask the person sharing product link for their product demo, screenshots, videos etc. And they can buy from sellers they trust.

comments.author: the rise
comments.body: sales are very secret , then what about files that are not in accordance with the agreement ?I just wrote to you in a private message hope you are interested

comments.author: bnbstorm
comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on January 19, 2023, 08:33:56 PMwhat happens if a seller provide a description and upload a wrong file/damaged or just make a scam? how it can be trusted the contents? did you plan to make escrow on transactions?what if there are virus/trojan/malware added to these files? did you plan to scan contents uploaded?There is a note added on bottom of each product that files belong to seller and you must trust them. We do not provide escrow services but you will get what seller uploaded after making payment. Buyer must do that on their side.Our system scans for viruses and we keep data encrypted so our system is protected. But for buyers someone can still upload a virus protected in password protected zip files so buyer must trust the seller before buying. That's why there is no option to view all products that are uploaded on our platform. Sellers only share links with their potential buyers themselves.

comments.author: bnbstorm
comments.body: Quote from: the rise on January 19, 2023, 08:40:47 PMsales are very secret , then what about files that are not in accordance with the agreement ?I just wrote to you in a private message hope you are interestedI hope you got your answer about file selling from above replies.We have check your dm and we really appreciate your services. We will contact you when we will need them.

comments.author: Danydee
comments.body: Quote from: bnbstorm on January 19, 2023, 08:08:13 PMhttps://selldefi.com//BErm0wMvbmOeYAlO1nqVThank you..so that's what I was questioning myself about :Quote.. (not refundable) !!#~ Once you paid, you have to download your product directly to don't lose it#~ Once your browser close, you can't download it again ! - why not provide a unique link for the payment page in case the buyer need to return to it in case of connection lost for example ?? - you could make a field to the seller to put a description of the file or just an url to the description.. (or for anonymity it is possible to make to field just for an ASH of the description so the buyer can check it)! This as an protection for the buyer in case there is some that try selling inexisting items that they don't actually have ! .. like this the buyer may ask for a refund... So making the service like this do not do not provide any addition than just like making a direct transaction between to seller and the buyer!

comments.author: bnbstorm
comments.created_time: January 19, 2023, 09:06:17 PMLast edit: January 21, 2023, 11:40:51 PM by bnbstorm
comments.body: Quote from: Danydee on January 19, 2023, 08:57:56 PMQuote from: bnbstorm on January 19, 2023, 08:08:13 PMhttps://selldefi.com//BErm0wMvbmOeYAlO1nqVThank you..so that's what I was questioning myself about :Quote.. (not refundable) !!#~ Once you paid, you have to download your product directly to don't lose it#~ Once your browser close, you can't download it again ! - why not provide a unique link for the payment page in case the buyer need to return to it in case of connection lost for example ?? - you could make a field to the seller to put a description of the file or just an url to the description.. (or for anonymity it is possible to make to field just for an ASH of the description so the buyer can check it)! This as an protection for the buyer in case there is some that try selling inexisting items that they don't actually have ! .. like this the buyer may ask for a refund... So making the service like this do not do not provide any addition than just like making a direct transaction between to seller and the buyer!There is a field to add description to each product. Maybe you did not saw it. Kindly check this product Link RemovedIt is not like a direct payment. You can just upload files and then you can sleep after sharing your product link .People will keep buying and you will receive payment without need to always send them files each times. Also Buyers do not need to wait for you to come online to send you files. They can pay and get your products anytime. Consider it like you have 100 website codes to sell. You can add description of each product and maybe include screenshot or video links for your website demo. After one time upload you can paste links on services like pastebin and share pastebin link. You have just created a digital store. You don't need to make a website for selling your products. You do not need to manage payment addresses etc. Consider it in big numbers and you will see difference i.e 10k buyers of 10 products in 1 hour. https://selldefi.com/ saves a lot of time and management work and I hope people will start using it once they understand it.

comments.author: bnbstorm
comments.body: Quote from: Danydee on January 19, 2023, 08:57:56 PMQuote from: bnbstorm on January 19, 2023, 08:08:13 PMhttps://selldefi.com//BErm0wMvbmOeYAlO1nqVThank you..so that's what I was questioning myself about :Quote.. (not refundable) !!#~ Once you paid, you have to download your product directly to don't lose it#~ Once your browser close, you can't download it again ! - why not provide a unique link for the payment page in case the buyer need to return to it in case of connection lost for example ?? - you could make a field to the seller to put a description of the file or just an url to the description.. (or for anonymity it is possible to make to field just for an ASH of the description so the buyer can check it)! This as an protection for the buyer in case there is some that try selling inexisting items that they don't actually have ! .. like this the buyer may ask for a refund... So making the service like this do not do not provide any addition than just like making a direct transaction between to seller and the buyer!Also buyer cannot lose file link if they use same browser which they used for making payment. For example you paid $100 for buying a product. You closed the tab and then came back after 1 hour. You can open product link again. You will see same bitcoin address that you have already paid to. Just click on "I have paid button" and your download link will appear. Product purchase information is stored on buyer browser cache which can be used to download product multiple times without paying again until they clean their browser cache.
